arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource, an S3 path.

lastModified.description: (Optional) The date and time the resource was last modified in [RFC 3339 format](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8).

roleArn.description:
Role that has read/write access to the resource. If not provided, the Lake Formation service-linked role must exist and is used.

> **NOTE:** AWS does not support registering an S3 location with an IAM role and subsequently updating the S3 location registration to a service-linked role.
